document_data.name: Horse Pond
document_data.mainbody: '''Horse Pond''' was a pond in [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]] on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Description: It was a muddy pond containing [[frog]]s and [[water lily|water lilies]], and it was used for drinking and washing water for horses.
document_data.History: In the midâ€“14th century DR, there was an incident in which [[skeleton]]s ventured out of the pond and ran amok through the village, strangling people before they were destroyed.
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
There was a legend that at the bottom of the pond there was a hidden entrance to the tomb of the [[Maiden King]], who ruled the area a long time before the 14th century [[DR]]. According to legend, she lay sleeping forever on a stone bed with her magic two-handed sword resting on her chest.

Some [[adventurer]]s entered the pond on several occasions and found nothing, but one band at least never returned.
